name: Forward Kinematics
description: Calculate the robot's forward kinematic for a given configuration.

inputParameters.name: config
inputParameters.description: The configuration to calculate the forward kinematics for.

inputParameters.name: group
inputParameters.description: The planning group used for calculation. Defaults to the robot's main planning group.

inputParameters.name: link
inputParameters.description: The link name to calculate forward kinematics for. Defaults to the robot's end effector.

inputParameters.name: use_only_model
inputParameters.description: If True, use only the robot model instead of the connected backend to calculate FK.
